content: I don't have the most up-to-date information about specific bars in london that serve the english lavender martini. however, you can use online platforms like yelp, tripadvisor, barchick, or google maps to find bars that specialize in gin-based cocktails or that have a good reputation for craft cocktails. you can also search for bars that have lavender syrup or other floral ingredients on their menus. once you find a few bars that look promising, you can call or visit their websites to see if they offer the english lavender martini or if they can create a similar cocktail for you.
